title: NoCheatPlus插件配置文件怎么修改啊
author: cheng8553128
txt_content:
NoCheatPlus插件配置文件怎么修改啊
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-343914-1-1.html


帖子里面说
插件与R键整理mod冲突！（配置文件内可修复），


可这配置文件怎么修改啊,到底是要改哪里??????

replies.author: BlackJocker
replies.txt_content:
在config.yml修改成这样
inventory:
  fastclick:
    active: false复制代码

replies.author: ^离殇
replies.txt_content:
给玩家添加 权限:
nocheatplus.checks.inventory.fastclick
nocheatplus.checks.combined.improbable


不会添加?
/mangaddp builder nocheatplus.checks.inventory.fastclick
/mangaddp builder nocheatplus.checks.combined.improbable
